features: FRAGRANCE-FREE FEMININE WASH: Designed for your vaginal wellness, our yoni wash for women includes natural ingredients that will help you keep your most sensitive area clean, fresh, and protected all day long!

WITH FRIENDLY INGREDIENTS: forvirness vagina wash for women is free of harmful chemicals to give you a simple, ph-balancing formula infused with kinds of natural extracts! It contains no sulfates, dyes or fragrances!

PH-BALANCED FOR YOU: Alkaline Care products can throw your pH out of balance. Use the ph balance feminine wash to keep your sensitive area healthy, clean and fresh day after day without disrupting their natural pH balance.

CLEAN, CALM & HYDRATES: The natural peach scent removes odors. Coconut oil, jojoba oil, aloe vera extract & lavender oil in intimate wash help to support feminine care, relieve vaginal dryness and itching, leaving your secret garden smooth and hydrated!
MADE FOR ALL WOMEN: Formulated safe for all skin types. The pH balance for women wash make you feel good and confident anytime! The vagina wash for good smell keeps you feeling comfortable everyday!
body.description: EASY APPLICATION: Forvieness - Made for vagina wellness & provide you natural, effective, gentle care. Clean, Plant-Based Ingredients Organic feminine wash was made with soothing and moisturizing natural ingredients, derived from Coconut oil, jojoba oil, aloe vera extract.The pH balance for women wash make you feel good and confident anytime! The vagina wash for good smell keeps you feeling comfortable everyday! How to use yoni wash 1.Take right amount of yoni gel 2.Work into a lather and apply it to your sensitive area 3.After about 10 seconds, rinse thoroughly with clean water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will keep buying
reviews.reviewText: My first time trying this product I was a little nervous because I don’t use anything down there besides soap and water. However, I liked it’s because I needed an exfoliators to use after my waxes. Not sure if it’s a true exfoliator but that’s what I use it for. And let me tell you, it’s WORKS. I love the peach smell it’s a light scent to me but apparently my husband can smell it just fine. I love the mint feel. And my wax lady asked me what I been doing differently because I have no in grown hair no more. So this is my 3rd time purchasing this product. Absolutely love.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Helps to balance out pH levels.
reviews.reviewText: I decided to order this feminine body wash, simply because it has wonderful benefits to your pH levels.The peach scent is nice, and this product is cruelty free, paraben free, and 100% vegan.I will say for the amount received, the price point is a little high. With this, my order arrived with the body wash not completely full. There’s about an inch gap from the top.
